#summary Details of the Mobile Service API

<h1>Mobile Service API</h1>

The mobile service exposes an API to make it easier to put data into, and retrieve data out of, the underlying [MobileServiceDatabaseTables Database Tables]. The mobile service is undergoing extensive development and changes / updates to the API will be listed here as they are made available.

Details of the API are in the following pages
